alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Cass; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:13PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL ITASCA, NORTHERN AITKIN, CENTRAL CASS AND NORTHERN CROW WING COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM CDT... At 313 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Swan River, to near Backus, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Jacobson around 320 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Crosslake, Breezy Point, Pequot Lakes and Fifty Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Cass; South Itasca
